item.title: You should never fix bugs and do code refactoring at the same time
item.description: How deep the rabbit hole goes? When coding, you might not want to find it out. Let’s see why!

item.title: Six software development tips from a senior software engineer
item.description: If you know how to learn from experienced people you will always be getting big perks from your work and relations. So here are a few tips for you.
